personal_info.name: Karan Nair
personal_info.address: The Dormers, Snipe Avenue, Upper New-Castle, Galway

objective: AI/ML Engineer with expertise in deep learning, NLP, and large language models, skilled in developing scalable AI solutions for data-driven decision-making and process optimization.

achievements: Part of the Targeted research team working on Contact Center Intelligence aiming to reduce operations cost and enhance customer experience.
Analyze Contact Center Logs and Call Records (within compliance) to derive insights into reducing operational cost by finding inconsistencies.
Working on AWS S3, Glue and Quick-Sight to design ETL pipelines, and Generate and expose visualizations to key stakeholders.
Research adapting AI into contact center workflow for increased productivity and automation.
Assisted in developing data preprocessing and model fine-tuning pipelines for Machine Translation LLMs from Hugging Face on AWS-SageMaker and AWS-Lambda.
Contributed to implementation of Lightweight models research using Quantization Aware Training (QAT) methods like Quantized Low-Rank Adaptation (QLoRA).

Explored distributed computing techniques to improve GPU utilization during quantization research using Distributed Data Parallelization (DDP) and Distributed Model Parallelization (MDP) in PyTorch using Nvidia Collective Communications Library (NCCL).Utilized AWS-S3, Lambda, and Sagemaker for model fine-tuning, inferencing, and data storage. Used MLflow for model registry and WANDB for Experimentation logging and meta-data documentation.

Led the design and implementation of a user-friendly GUI and automated backend processes for PC and RF-Scanner interfaces in custom QAD modules, streamlining shipment procedures and protocols for OEMs.

Excelled in a techno-functional role by delivering impactful client presentations and coordinating cross-departmental tasks, contributing to a 5% Improvement in project delivery timelines and enhanced client satisfaction.

Delivered comprehensive training sessions for clients and internal teams, effectively demonstrating advanced proficiency in automation tools and techniques. These sessions were tailored to bridge skill gaps, enhance operational efficiency, and empower teams to leverage automation for improved productivity and streamlined workflows.Bridged technical and business needs by leveraging Python for data-driven solutions, translating requirements into actionable results, and ensuring robust documentation and version control with GIT-leading to a 10% Reduction in post-deployment issues.
Designed and developed a user-friendly GUI framework tailored for Medical Institutions and Educational Platforms, enhancing usability and accessibility.
Contributed to an internal project focused on Library Maintenance, utilizing Gradient for learning and applying advanced computational techniques.
Strengthened technical skills in GUI development, project documentation, and iterative learning of new tools and frameworks.

research_work.title: Enhanced opinion retrieval in large language models (LLMs)
research_work.description: Fine-tuned Mistral-7B and LLaMA-8B with contrastive learning methods
outcomes: Improved LLM opinion retrieval accuracy by 15%
